CustomField.inlineHelpText: A. Only operational debt and/or private convertible debt (including SAFE notes and similar instruments): .90 - 1.0 B. Private debt, venture debt, loans, promissory notes, or other non-public debt: 1.0 - 1.2 C. Public debt: 1.2 - 2.0
CustomField.label: Debt Structure (Factor)
